Name: Ecco Domani174 Pinot Grigio - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: This a fantastic white wine for any occasion!

Name: Fresh Craft174 Mango Citrus - 4pk / 250ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Tart, not sweet...very refreshing and delicious!

Name: 1000 Stories174 Zinfandel - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: I was given this wine so it was a delightful surprise to find that it has a flavorful and delicious taste! A new favorite!!!!

Name: 1000 Stories174 Zinfandel - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: This is a phenomenal wine and my new favorite red.

Name: Pink Moscato - 3l Bottle - Wine Cube153
Reviews Text: 4 750ml bottles for the price of two With way less packaging YES PLEASE! I was nervous it was too good to be true and I wouldn't like the wine but it's fantastic! I have to go a bit out of my way to get it (I live near a state line and it isn't sold in my state due to liquor laws) but it's worth it.

Name: Beck's174 Non Alcoholic Beer - 6pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Text: I LOVE Becks NA. It tastes just like a regular ale. It smells like one too. It tastes great. It's the only NA that I drink. My friends love it too. It has a great head when you pour.

Name: Apothic174 Red Blend - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: This wine has a wonderful but strong aroma its a bit bitter has a bite to it but still goodit was worth it in the end

Name: Apothic174 Red Blend - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: I would give one more star if it came clean on the bottle and called itself a 'sweet red'. Instead it get's poetic and grandiose about itself when all it is is a blend which (standard practice) gets a dash of grape juice concentrate to sweeten it. It also looses a star for the price, I rather look to the side of my Target's shelves and pick-up a Lambrusco for about 3-4 less.

Name: California Roots Moscato White Wine - 750ml
Reviews Text: Delicious and very affordable

Name: Charles Charles174 Red Blend - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: This is a very smooth red with Aromas of cocoa, coffee, tobacco sweet black cherry. Bold but soft. I highly recommend this one.

Name: Fancy Pants174 Sauvignon Blanc - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Based on positive reviews, I served all of the Fancy Pants varieties at a recent party. My guests and I loved them! Since I am not a wine expert, I will provide some details on this variety from the Fancy Pants website: ...is like sunshine in the glass. Its brisk and bright, with inviting citrus, melon and passion fruit aromas leading to mouthwatering grapefruit and zesty lime flavors with hints of minerality on the palate. Vibrant acidity and a crisp, clean finish make this wine a versatile partner for a wide range of foodsespecially succulent seafood, Mediterranean-style grilled vegetables, and salads. Served well chilled, our Sauvignon Blanc is fun and friendlythe perfect pour for sunny afternoons and picnics.

Name: Martini Rossi174 Asti Spumante Sparkling Wine - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Title: Nice Sparkling Wine Compared To Champagne
Reviews Text: Nice fruity and sweet taking sparkling wine. Goes great in mimosa. You have to try it to see how you will like it. Even the guys would enjoy this at your wedding!

Name: 603174 Winni Amber Ale - 6pk / 12oz Cans
Reviews Text: A rich amber Ale with a subtle but noticeable hop character. Great beer to pair with food!

Name: 603174 White Peaks Ipa - 6pk / 12oz Cans
Reviews Text: This light bodied IPA is dry hopped with cascade for a bold and bright HP aroma, balanced by a refreshing and crisp Ale. Great for a cookout out day at the beach, love it!

Name: 603174 White Peaks Ipa - 6pk / 12oz Cans
Reviews Text: This light bodied IPA is dry hopped with cascade for a bold and bright HP aroma, balanced by a refreshing and crisp Ale. Great for a cookout out day at the beach, love it!

Name: Sofia Coppola174 Riesling - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Great for a perfect summer day or a get together with the girls.

Name: California Roots Pinot Grigio White Wine - 750ml
Reviews Text: I'm not sure if this is a bad bottle or if it was intentionally made effervescent. I don't want bubbles when I drink Pinot Grigio. Goes well with mozzarella string cheese and Cinemasins.

Name: Sancho Libre174 Peach - 4pk / 12oz Cans
Reviews Text: Obsessed with this new drink----However, it has been sold out at every Target I have been to lately :(

Name: Modern House174 With Love Red Blend - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: This is an excellent red wine, not to dry and not real sweet. More of a red blend. Great go with anything anytime. In the right price point as other known brands on the market.

Name: Estancia174 Cabernet Sauvignon - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: One of the best Cabernets I had in quite sometime......!!!!!!

Name: Voga Italia174 Pinot Grigio - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: This is a great buy for the price. Someone had given me a bottle and I liked the look of it so much that I didn't want to open it. Had no idea it was so nicely priced and so easily available. Finally opened it when I was in a bind, needing white wine for a favorite holiday recipe and this was all I had on hand. It's a nice, smooth Pinot, very nice flavor, pleasurable to the palate. What I especially love about this brand, however, is the bottle itself! Screw off the black top and there is a smaller neck with a cork closure. The beauty is that the black cap is designed so that it will reseal the bottle without the cork needing to be squeezed back in...a really thoughtful design. I almost hate to admit how much I was impressed by it! Will be stopping by Target specifically to buy more to have in the house. Highly recommend.

Name: Michelob174 Ultra Light Cider Beer - 6pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Text: Gluten free plus lower on calories plus very refreshing!

Name: Cabernet Shiraz - 3l Bottle - Wine Cube153
Reviews Title: Please Don't Discontinue This Flavor Combination!
Reviews Text: Best of the bunch of all of The wine Cube sku's. Target Wine Buyer: please bring back!

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon - 3l Bottle - Wine Cube153
Reviews Title: Wine Is Good - The Cube Is Not
Reviews Text: I like the wine and I like the idea of a sealed cube during the week when only drinking a glass or two at a time. But when they re-sized the box a few months ago, it made it impossible to open and setup properly. While I applaud Target for reducing the packaging, this just isn't working.

Name: Risata174 Moscato D'asti - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: I have tried my share of Moscato D' Astis before, this has to be the smoothest that I have ever tried. Not too sweet or too fizzy but perfect. I got it for the pretty bottle but was very surprised about the taste. Try it, you won't be disappointed.

Name: Barefoot174 Refresh Perfectly Pink - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Highly, highly recommend!! It's sweet but not syrupy- just right! And I love that it's bubbly, I don't have to mix my wine with seltzer anymore!

Name: Tecate174 Beer - 12pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Text: My favorite bottle design. The best cheap lager.

Name: Bud Light174 Raz-Ber-Rita - 12pk / 8oz Cans
Reviews Text: Delicious. I hate all the other flavors but this one tastes great. Now if I can only find it in the store.

Name: California Roots Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine - 750ml
Reviews Title: Who Can Say No To Awesome $5 Wine
Reviews Text: This wine is amazing! I'm an avid wine drinker (mom life) and I'll continue to buy this for sure. For 5 it's a steal! Keep this around please, it's just another reason to love target!

Name: Middle Sister174 Red Blend - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Love it that it's not too dry or overly sweet. Also has a good balance of alcohol.

Name: Robert Mondavi Private Selection174 Bourbon Cabernet Sauvignon - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: This wine was sooooo good. I usually don't like Cabernet but this special fermented wine is very tasty. It did not stay around too long.LOL.

Name: Riesling - 3l Bottle - Wine Cube153
Reviews Text: Some of the best boxed wine I have ever tasted. Great taste and great value.

Name: Risata174 Pink Moscato - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Love this Moscato and will be purchasing more on my next Target run. Let it chill in the fridge and enjoy on a hot summer day.

Name: Middle Sister174 Moscato - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Had my sissies (sistafriends) over for dinner/planning meeting....and they're still talking about the loving fellowship and the great wine! I hope the store has more than 1 bottle left on its shelves!!!

Name: Love Noir174 Ros233 - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Great fruity dry rose!

Name: Handsome Devil174 Malbec - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Is this the greatest wine in the world, of course not. It is an eminently drinkable wine,as a matter of fact it is my preferred, and go to, table wine. Wine is a personal thing but for me it is my 1 pick in the under 10 category. It is well balanced, subtle, and very easy to sip. Dry without being overpowering. It is not a big bad Cabernet but it is not that in a good way. Goes great by itself or paired with cheese or a dish sauced with something heavier like a bernaise. I always have a bottle on my shelf.

Name: Apothic174 White Blend - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Delicious white wine! Light, crisp, not too sweet. Almost too good.

Name: Pinot Noir - 3l Bottle - Wine Cube153
Reviews Title: No No No No No.... No
Reviews Text: Just bad wine. The worst I have ever had. Try Bota Box Sarah is you are looking for a decent boxed wine.

Name: Love Noir174 Pinot Noir - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: I am no wine expert by any means, but I love a good red for dinner or a cold night. This is the ticket. Rich, dark, fruity! Just lovely. The hubby liked it too!

Name: Promisqous174 Red Blend - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Best wine I ever tasted

Name: Chardonnay - 3l Bottle - Wine Cube153
Reviews Text: not fruity, very satisfying. my go to chardonnay! excellent product - would expect to pay 10 / bottle for this quality

Name: Red Blend - 500ml Bottle - Wine Cube153
Reviews Text: Picked some up on a trip to the beach as they are portable non breakable and priced right! I didn't know what to expect, honestly, my expectations were not too high, being boxed wine and all. I was pleasantly surprised! It is very drinkable delicious! When I got home I returned to Target to get the large wine cube box for at home enjoyment!

Name: Sauvignon Blanc - 3l Bottle - Wine Cube153
Reviews Title: Great Sauvignon Blanc Even Compared To Medium-Priced Bottles
Reviews Text: By far the best boxed wine I've found, and comparable to medium-priced bottled sauvignon blancs. A great buy.

Name: Sauvignon Blanc - 3l Bottle - Wine Cube153
Reviews Title: Great Sauvignon Blanc Even Compared To Medium-priced Bottles
Reviews Text: By far the best boxed wine I've found, and comparable to medium-priced bottled sauvignon blancs. A great buy.

Name: California Roots Chardonnay White Wine - 750ml
Reviews Text: Taste was absolutely fine for a 5 Chardonnay. However, BOTH bottles broke while removing the corkscrew. Second break was far enough I didn't want to risk drinking it because of risk of glass shards. I've bought cheaper wines like yellowtail, etc, and NEVER experienced a bottle breaking.

Name: California Roots Chardonnay White Wine - 750ml
Reviews Text: I didnt find this to be sweet at all, but everyones taste differs. I usually dont like sweet wines so I gravitate towards Chardonnay and some Sauvignon Blancs and I felt like this one had more of a buttery taste than a sweet citrusy taste like another reviewer stated. For the price, this is definitely a keeper.

Name: Red Blend - 3l Bottle - Wine Cube153
Reviews Text: My boyfriend brought this home on a whim. We were delighted at how tasty it was. Lasted us a couple weeks - even better!

Name: Disaronno174 Almond Liqueur - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: I love Disaronno. It has a smooth texture and the flavor is lightly sweet. It's decadent on the rocks or with a little cream.

Name: Pinot Grigio - 500ml Bottle - Wine Cube153
Reviews Text: I'm surprised how good this is for the price! Tastes more like Sauvignon blanc to me...

Name: California Roots Red Blend Wine - 750ml
Reviews Text: Nice, light wine - I was not sure what to expect but was surprised how well it tasted for a 5 bottle.

Name: Chardonnay - 1l Bottle - Wine Cube153
Reviews Title: Pretty Good For Wine In A Box!
Reviews Text: For as much as we drink white wine, I needed to find a budget bottle. We'd been doing 6-7 dollar bottles, but this beats that. And it's pretty good! You won't impress anyone with this, but for a Monday-Thursday, home and on a budget drinking, this is good.

Name: Fancy Pants174 Cabernet Sauvignon - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: I served this and all the different varieties at a party. My guests and I loved them all. Since I am not a wine expert, I will simply give you some of the notes on this variety from the Fancy Pants website: ...a robust and rich palate with ripe berries, red fruit, and toasty oak flavors. Cherries and vanilla spice on the mouth lead to a long, lingering finish.

Name: Beringer174 Be. Flirty Pink Moscato - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Title: Tried The Past Type & It's My Favorite So This Should Be Great!
Reviews Text: I tried Beringer, who makes this, Pink Moscato, had no trouble opening it up with a Corkscrew, one which I just bought from Target in-store, really like its sweet, fruity flavor pink looking wine. I plan to stock up for the Holidays.

Name: Fancy Pants174 Red Blend - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: If you like a fruit forward blend of reds with a very smooth finish and jammy taste, you will love this! I think my 9 year search for my favorite red wine has ended!

Name: Josh Cellars174 Ros233 - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: This is a dry Rose, not sweet at all which is perfect for summer!

Name: Sofia Rose 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: A wonderful dry wine, and the taste is just divine!

Name: Sofia Rose 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: A wonderful dry wine, and the taste is just divine!

Name: Strongbow174 Gold Apple Hard Cider - 6pk / 11.2oz Bottles
Reviews Text: Been looking for Strongbow in the US for years

Name: Spiked Seltzer174 Indian River Grapefruit - 6pk / 12oz Cans
Reviews Text: Refreshing, nice grapefruit flavor. Not for people that dislike seltzer water. It's good out of the can or poured over ice.

Name: Truly174 Colima Lime - 6pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Title: Here Are The Reasons I Like Truly
Reviews Text: IT IS NOT SWEET,AND I LIKE THAT. IF YOU LIKE THE TASTE OF SPARKLING WATER WITH THE BENEFIT OF 5 ALCOHOL. THIS IS FOR YOU.

Name: Cupcake Vineyards174 Cabernet Sauvignon - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Title: Best Cabernet I've Ever Tasted, Simple As That.
Reviews Text: Best Cabernet I've ever tasted, simple as that.

Name: Truly174 Grapefruit Pomelo - 6pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Text: so refreshing! LOVEIT!

Name: Cayman Jack174 Margarita Malt Beverage - 6pk / 11.2oz Bottles
Reviews Text: This Cayman Jack margarita is really good. I found it in a Southern California Target, but I can't find it in Northern California stores. :(

Name: George Killian's174 Premium Irish Red - 6pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Title: Decent Beer For A Good Price
Reviews Text: I expected this beer to be on the bitter side the first time I tried it, but I still enjoyed its smooth taste. I'd definitely buy it if I get a chance.

Name: Entwine174 Cabernet Sauvignon - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Title: Looked like a linear regulator from outside and no reviews on ...
Reviews Text: Looked like a linear regulator from outside and no reviews on it so I ordered this puppy to put it to the test. definitely a switcher and fairly quiet. Well regulated Just like all of RM Italy products, great quality.

Name: La Marca174 Prosecco - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: I love sparkling wine, but I find that most brands are sweet. I'm aging and no longer want the sweet stufd. This is medium body wine with strong bubbles (I love bubbles ) . The alcohol content offers a nice buzz fairly quickly. So ecstatic I found this brand and Target carries it.

Name: Alamos174 Malbec - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: I served this at my baby shower and everyone went crazy over it. It's an inexpensive gem.

Name: Bogle Vineyards174 Chardonnay - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: This wine is full-bodied and delicious.

Name: Black Box174 Cabernet Sauvignon - 3l Bottle
Reviews Text: Super wine with fruity taste. As a regular wine drinker this is our routine wine of choice. Priced right with good taste.

Name: Black Box174 Cabernet Sauvignon - 3l Bottle
Reviews Text: Had a taste of either being old or spoiled. Stick with the bottle.

Name: Black Box174 Cabernet Sauvignon - 3l Bottle
Reviews Text: This is our go-to wine for dinner parties. Better than most of the 10 bottles.

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Title: Always Have Jb Original On Hand
Reviews Text: I have been enjoying Jim Beam Original for many years. I started mixing JB-O with Slice while wife and I watched Dallas. I have tried other whiskeys, but keep coming back to JB. Now I enjoy it mixed with Diet Pepsi (since I can no longer find Slice).

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Text: It goes great in apple cider

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Text: Consistent flavor and quality. JB with Dr. Pepper is surprisingly tasty. I highly recommend it. Love your commercials, too. Mila is doing you proud. Keep up the good work.

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Title: A Drink That Stands Out; And Smooth As Well...
Reviews Text: A true classic of spirits...

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Text: I love this Bourbon as it is always my first choice when its time to unwind. Whether its Neat, On Rocks, With a Coke or Ginger Ale, or my Grandpa's Whiskey Sour, nothing tops Jim Beam!!!! Nothing!!!

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Title: It is the first drink I check everytime
Reviews Text: The white label or the devil's cut dashed with some lemonade and lime cordial is how I enjoy my Jim.

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Text: Best Drink you can get

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Text: to make manhattens

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Text: Best bourbon I have found...have toured distillery and love the brand..

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Text: Red Stag and Coke Zero is my go to drink. Only wish more bars and restaurants stocked it. Nothing like a good bourbon with a cherry kick !

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Text: I like it with dr.peper to sip and relax

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Text: Better than the other's

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Text: Drank it for years and always smooth and tasty. Now it is running off the shelves at our liquor store.

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Text: I keep Jim Beam on hand every day of the week.

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Text: I typically have this neat or with an ice cube. Its light amber appearance, sweet, woody, mossy nose, and its mild moss, white oak, mellow wintergreen mint, and dried, faintly-candied fruit flavor draws the drinker into an exploration of pin-point distilling execution. Jim Beam Original has a gradual finish, with a ghost of chocolate powder, during the fade out. Highly recommended. RJT

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Title: I would buy this drink over and over.
Reviews Text: It's does have a great toaste to it the only drink I'll drink.

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Text: I had a neat 2 finger glass two weeks ago of JB Black label for the first time (I've always drank Jack Daniels) and I loved it! No more Jack for me!

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Text: Best tasteing and defenetly the smoothest around I love it!

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Text: I always keep a bottle of Jim Bean in my liquor cabinet. Value for price is incredible and it mixes great.

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Text: This is our favorite mixed drink whiskey and sams has the best price on a handle. We'll be buying this again

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Text: Best whiskey around and a price that can't be beat!!

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Text: to make manhattens

Name: Jim Beam174 Bourbon Whiskey - 1.75l Bottle
Reviews Text: Best bourbon I have found...have toured distillery and love the brand..

Name: Yellow Tail174 Cabernet Sauvignon - 1.5l Bottle Bottle
Reviews Text: I drink Yellow Tail because you can not buy a perfect wine for the price of this one, I JUST LOVE IT!!!!!!

Name: El Jimador174 Tequila Reposado - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: I always buy this item at Walmart cause they always have it at a Great Price

Name: Basil Hayden's174 Bourbon - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: As a Scotch drinker, tasting Basil Hayden's for the first time changed my opinion of Bourbons. Now I enjoy both Scotch Bourbon with BH on the top of list for Bourbons!

Name: Basil Hayden's174 Bourbon - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Very tasty bourbon!

Name: Basil Hayden's174 Bourbon - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Basil Hayden was my gateway to world of Burbon. Ever since I have held its flavor profile as the gold standard when trying others on the market bit I always find myself coming back to my first love.

Name: Basil Hayden's174 Bourbon - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Outstanding. Simply an outstanding beverage. Spicy and light with a comforting finish. A staple in my home bar rotation - I never let a bottle get near empty without backfilling it with a fresh one.

Name: Cook's174 Brut Champagne - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: I love the Cooks champagne however I cannot drink the brut. Would love Extra dry to become available at Sams in Mobile AL.

Name: Menage A Trois174 Silk Red Blend - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: My favorite red wine has been Menage a Trois for a long time, and this SILK blend is even better than the regular blend. The price has remained affordable while the quality has remained consistently good for these red blends.

Name: Barefoot174 Riesling - 1.5l Bottle Bottle
Reviews Text: My mother turned me on to Barefoot Riesling a few years back and it had been a reflex to always choose it when given the option.

Name: Davinci174 Chianti - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Been trying to find a red wine with a smooth finish. This stuff is exactly what I was looking for.

Name: Hornitos Reposado Tequila - 750ml
Reviews Text: Perfect sipping tequila ... chilled and neat !

Name: Hornitos Reposado Tequila - 750ml
Reviews Text: Perfect sipping tequila ... chilled and neat !

Name: Hornitos Reposado Tequila - 750ml
Reviews Text: My buddy ordered some shots of this stuff during a horns game. Frankly when it comes to tequila, I usually brace myself for a rough shot. Maybe I'm drinking the wrong stuff, because this was really easy to put back. No lingering aftertaste. Reasonably priced. Good value tequila if you're looking.

Name: Hornitos Reposado Tequila - 750ml
Reviews Text: Straight over ice.

Name: Pinnacle174 Whipped Cream Flavored Vodka - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: My drink of choice when I really want to enjoy my time alone.

Name: Pinnacle174 Whipped Cream Flavored Vodka - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Title: Makes The Best Jello Shots Ever!!
Reviews Text: Makes orange jello taste like creamsicle, strawberry taste like strawberries and cream, lemon taste like lemon meringue....I could go on and on....get some today!!

Name: Pinnacle174 Whipped Cream Flavored Vodka - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Pinnacle has been making our Martini's in my family for many years. My late father discovered it years ago when someone said it's on par with that vodka that flys south for the winter, but at a very reasonable price. Try it, bet you'll love it too. Al

Name: Pinnacle174 Whipped Cream Flavored Vodka - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: The whipped creme flavored vodka is fabulous. I keep it in the freezer and have a snifter of it when I want something smooth after dinner or as a night cap. Love it!

Name: Pinnacle174 Whipped Cream Flavored Vodka - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Everything is great about this product, cheap price, perfect taste. Mixing this flavor with just a soda makes it delicious.

Name: Pinnacle174 Whipped Cream Flavored Vodka - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: I love this vodka, I have been drinking vodka for many years, and this is by far one of the best, and my favorite vodka. I drink it regularly, usually with grape juice, but also with orange juice. We use it to make daiquiris, and many other frozen concoctions.

Name: Skinnygirl174 Original Margarita - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Just so so. Seems to be missing something. There are much better margarita mixes out there without all the additives this does not have.

Name: Mirassou174 Pinot Noir - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Very good summer red. It's become our favorite reasonably priced wine that we enjoy on its own.

Name: Seagram's174 Escapes Malt Beverage Variety Pack - 12pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Text: love all of the flavors. will be buying again. great for summer drinks

Name: Seagram's174 Escapes Malt Beverage Variety Pack - 12pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Text: I bought this pack on a whim and I'm so glad I did. There is a variety of drinks for a great price, even less than the discount liquor store! I'll definitely get this again!

Name: Seagram's174 Escapes Malt Beverage Variety Pack - 12pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Text: Vrty good

Name: Seagram's174 Escapes Malt Beverage Variety Pack - 12pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Text: Jamaican me happy

Name: Seagram's174 Escapes Malt Beverage Variety Pack - 12pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Title: Tasty if you can find it
Reviews Text: Really enjoy these but SAMs likes to send you on wild goose chases saying available and none to be found not even the empty pallet

Name: Apothic174 Dark Red Blend - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Title: Best Red Blend for the price
Reviews Text: We have been buying Apothic Dark for a couple of years now. It is our Red Blend of Choice. Very Smooth and very reasonably priced.

Name: Apothic174 Dark Red Blend - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Decent table wine for the price. Bend that is on the sweeter side of the spectrum.

Name: Rumchata174 Caribbean Rum - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Rum Chata is great when mixed with Fireball or Caramel Vodka

Name: Sauza174 Silver Tequila - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Title: Love The Cucumber Chili, Wish It Wasn't Discontinued.
Reviews Text: Love this brand of tequila. I'm a Margarita fan and like to make different kinds

Name: Corona Extra174 Beer - 12pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Text: love it wouldnt mind drinking more

Name: Bud Light174 Lime Beer - 12pk / 12oz Cans
Reviews Text: On a hot day near the water, this is the cheap-ish beer to have. Bud light with a solid splash of lime, makes it a light and refreshing choice. The Target 12-pack is average-priced and will provide a beverage most will enjoy - particularly the ladies.

Name: Absolut174 Mandarin Vodka - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Love this vodka - it's perfect for screwdrivers! It blends so well with the juice and for an interesting citrus blend, you can use grapefruit juice.

Name: Menage A Trois174 Red Blend - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: We've been drinking this wine for a while. It's one of a group we buy regularly because it's a good wine at an affordable price.

Name: Menage A Trois174 Red Blend - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Never disappointed, constant taste.

Name: Menage A Trois174 Red Blend - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: A delicious blended wine ... give it a try, you might be surprised

Name: Schmitt Sohne174 Relax Riesling - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: This is by far the best reisling I've ever had! LOVE it! Always consistent in flavor and my go to!

Name: Blue Moon174 Belgian White Wheat Ale - 12pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Text: Great Taste don't forget a slice of orage on the side!

Name: Kinky174 Fruit Liqueur - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Very fruity. Smooth. I like it straight over ice with a bit of Chambord.

Name: Corona Light174 Beer - 6pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Text: Tastes absolutley nothing like Chinese restaurant tea... not even similar. It's absolutley horrible, bitter and acrid. With shipping I paid 50 cents per bag... what an amazing rip off. You can go to a local Oriental store and get this kind of stuff for 2 cents per bag... and it would probably taste better.

Name: Corona Light174 Beer - 6pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Text: I don't know why some people wrote bad reviews about this tea. It is just like the tea I've grown up with that I had in Chinese Restaurants. The only complaint I have is that I found the same tea while visiting an Asian store out of town and it was only 2.00 per box while this one was more than double plus a 2.99 shipping fee. I knocked the rating down one star because of the outrageous price this seller charges.

Name: Corona Light174 Beer - 6pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Text: Had a cup of this tea and it was like reliving the past. Always drank this blend at a small Chinese Resturant in Queens, NY. After my first sip I felt like I was back thier enjoying a big pot of tea. Smooth and Relaxing, great blend and will be ordering more soon.

Name: Corona Light174 Beer - 6pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Text: Yes! this IS just like the Chinese restaurant tea. I used to receive a tea bag or two from my favorite Chinese take out, but nobody does that anymore. I'd save my teabag for the next day to drink with the leftovers, to enhance the leftovers. Now, I can enjoy this tea anytime. This is a refreshing tea that does not make one feel as if we should be adding milk and/or eating some cookies or cakes with it. This tea can stand alone and refresh the inner soul. I drink it with just a pinch of sugar.

Name: Corona Light174 Beer - 6pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Text: I gave this to my husband for christmas and he loves it. Says it smells good, it has a nice flavor and a smooth texture, just like the tea you are served in Chinese Restaurants :)

Name: Corona Light174 Beer - 6pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Title: Tasty blend of green, jasmine and oolong tea. Hard to find in stores where I live.
Reviews Text: I really like this tea and have bought it many times. The blend called Chinese Restaurant Tea is a blend of green, oolong and jasmine. It doesn't contain ginseng or black tea, which might explain why some people don't like it. (Black tea is more common and smoother tasting than green, which can be grassy or sharp tasting.) It does taste like the teas I have had at better Asian restaurants. (Some of the cheapo ones don't even serve tea any more.)I like the packaging and the name. Kind of quirky, stripped down and charming to my mind. It is hard for me to find this tea in stores. I called the company and they said it was only available in certain regions. (My store had carried it but stopped apparently due to this regional issue -- no longer available in our part of PA.) It was much cheaper in the store than it is on-line but I am just glad to have found it! Thanks for carrying it, Amazon and friends!

Name: Corona Light174 Beer - 6pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Text: Really, that's all I have to say. I have ordered this tea several times. Tastes EXACTLY like the Chinese tea that you can find in any major Chinese restaurant.

Name: Corona Light174 Beer - 6pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Title: Good taste, but is it real Ginseng
Reviews Text: I really like the taste of the tea, especially cold. It's a green tea mixed with Ginseng, and they've added licorice root to perhaps sweeten the tea. I don't even add any sugar or honey to it, the taste is that good. My only complaint is that the box claims it is 100 natural, but I wish they would disclose the amount and type of Ginseng. I bought this tea because of the Ginseng, so it would be nice if they disclosed what type of Ginseng and what concentration of it is in the tea itself. Since this is a pretty inexpensive tea, I'm guessing it's a cheap low-quality Ginseng, but like I said, it is tasty. Another nice benefit of this tea is that you can just drop the tea bag into a glass of room temperature water and drink it that way, it's very tasty this way! You don't have to steep or brew it with hot water, so it makes it a nice drinkable tea year round.

Name: Corona Light174 Beer - 6pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Text: I like all ingredients in this tea: Green tea, Licorice root and Ginseng. Specially Licorice root can relieve a spasmodic cough and test like Mint

Name: Corona Light174 Beer - 6pk / 12oz Bottles
Reviews Text: We like this brand especially when we make stir fry. Can't find it in the grocery stores any longer and was happy I could find it on line.

Name: Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey Pet-750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: I typically have this neat or with an ice cube. Its light amber appearance, sweet, woody, mossy nose, and its mild moss, white oak, mellow wintergreen mint, and dried, faintly-candied fruit flavor draws the drinker into an exploration of pin-point distilling execution. Jim Beam Original has a gradual finish, with a ghost of chocolate powder, during the fade out. Highly recommended. RJT

Name: Jim Beam174 Black Bourbon Whiskey - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: I'm a single malt Scotch guy. I generally have two fingers neat with a quality cigar about once a week. On a stressful day, I'll have a couple of beers or so after work before the family gets home. The trouble is the beer gut that comes with that trend. I was looking for something similar to my favorite Scotch, which is a little out of my budget to drink daily. Jim Beam Black is an awesome substitute with the rich white oak aroma and flavor. It isn't near as smooth as my favorite Scotch, but the flavor is on point. Thank you Jim Beam for putting this great whiskey out there at an affordable price. You've got a customer for life!

Reviews Text: I been drinking Riunite for years......it's great with food, partying with friends and family, or just relaxing. I will be buying it for the Holidays to go with my Gumbo..

Name: Riunite174 Lambrusco - 1.5l Bottle Bottle
Reviews Text: This wine taste really good. I love the soft flavor. I will buy this again.

Name: Riunite174 Lambrusco - 1.5l Bottle Bottle
Reviews Text: This is the wine, at a wonderful club price. Why isn't the Rosa and other ones carried by Sam's

Name: Riunite174 Lambrusco - 1.5l Bottle Bottle
Reviews Text: This wine is amazing it's not too sweet not to bitter. It is a great inexpensive wine.

Name: Carnivor174 Cabernet Sauvignon - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Fruity, full body, cheap. Go well with Asian foods! If you are looking to buy a red for wedding, this is the one. I got so many compliments from my anniversary this year on this red. If you want the cheaper wine, sure, you can go with VEO or Menage a Trois though. Carnivor is still a great wine!

Name: Bartenura174 Moscato - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: I bought this wine for my christmas party and everyone loved it, especially the guests who'd never had wine before. Bartenura Moscato beat out all the other kinds that I'd set out for the party.

Name: Luccio174 Moscato D'asti - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Had a chance to try some this beverage. Wonderful sparkling taste! Great for celebrations.

Name: Luccio174 Moscato D'asti - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: I tried this wine for the first time and it's delicious I love it, I now have a favorite wine.

Name: Luccio174 Moscato D'asti - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: I love this wine. It has a sweet smooth taste that could easily leave you drunk if you not careful. Please restock it. The last 4 times I've been in the store it's been out of stock.

Name: Cruz Garcia174 Red Sangria - 1.5l Bottle Bottle
Reviews Text: sweet, low alcohol content, enjoy sipping

Name: Stella Artois174 Premium Lager - 12pk / 11.2oz Bottles
Reviews Title: The Prices Are Fantastic! You Won't Find A Better Price Anywhere! Please Continue This Price!
Reviews Text: The prices are fantastic! You won't find a better price anywhere! Please continue this price!

Name: Stella Artois174 Premium Lager - 12pk / 11.2oz Bottles
Reviews Text: If you have never enjoyed a Stella Artois you don't know what you are missing

Name: Daily's174 Frozen Pina Colada - 10oz Pouch
Reviews Title: Awesome on a Hot summer Day
Reviews Text: found this at Walmart in Oregon last week when they were having our Arkansas weather! Wow was it great stuff, now back home on the mad search for it here! Nummy good!

Name: Daily's174 Frozen Pina Colada - 10oz Pouch
Reviews Text: Gooood!!!

Name: Daily's174 Frozen Pina Colada - 10oz Pouch
Reviews Text: I love he convenience of this item. I just wish they were already frozen.

Name: Roscato174 Sweet Red - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Very good for the price

Name: Roscato174 Sweet Red - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: All the people I had referred this wine with were impressed as how smooth and tasty this wine is! However, this only has 7 alcohol. But that's about how far sweet reds go, if you can find sweet red this sweet that is over 10 alcohol content please let me know! I absolutely love this SWEET RED!

Name: Roscato174 Sweet Red - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Title: Definitely one of my favorite wines.
Reviews Text: You can never go wrong with this wine, a glass of this Roscato and you are set. It is not sparkling, dry, or overbearing. Definitely my go to.

Name: Roscato174 Sweet Red - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: This Roscato is sweet. Very crisp and mildly sweet, but it is delicious

Name: Roscato174 Sweet Red - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: thise wine is a copy cat of the original

Name: Roscato174 Sweet Red - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: WHAT FULL LIGHT SWEET TASTEING TABLE WINE. ALSO VERY GOOD TO COOK WITH,GREAT FLAVOR.

Name: Patron174 Silver Tequila - 375ml Bottle
Reviews Text: This candy is amazing! I'm a BIG tea fan. Iced, hot, green, black, whatever kinda tea it is, i like it. The classic iced tea tastes just like what it says... classic iced tea. The citrus is like if you were to squeeze a lemon into a glass of tea. The green tea latte is a bit strange. It tastes a lot like caramel, but also has a tea flavor to it. Its good as well. Also the shipping was great. I ordered it on a Friday and got it the next Monday. Overall, some of the greatest hard candy i've ever tried, and by far, the best tea candy.

Name: Patron174 Silver Tequila - 375ml Bottle
Reviews Text: This is a great candy, rich flavor, and everyone who tried it, loved it, I will be ordering this fine candy again.

Name: Patron174 Silver Tequila - 375ml Bottle
Reviews Title: Great way to try all three flavors...
Reviews Text: This little 3-pack assortment is a great way to try all three flavors of Bali's Best Tea Candy. Previously, I had purchased a single pack of the Citrus Green Tea, from a specialty shop. It was so incredible... I wish I had bought about 10 packs of it.Upon reading reviews, I thought the Classic Iced Tea might be to my liking as well. I am not a big fan of green tea latte, but thought that I should give it a try, since other people raved about it so much. I was right. The Green Tea Latte was my least favorite of the three. It reminded me a little of green tea ice cream. Okay once in a while, but not an every day treat for me. I prefer the crisp/clear taste, over the creamy/milky flavor. Just personal preference.Now, I simply cannot decide which of the other 2 flavors I love more. They are so incredible tasting, and smooth textured. I love both the astringency and the acidity. They are perfectly balanced, and the flavors play like a melody on the palate. If I could, I would order a case of each of them... just so I could have them on hand all the time. They are by far, my favorite candy, bar none. No pun intended. :)*Note to sellers, I refuse to pay 5 or 6 shipping on a single 1.99 bag of candy. This is absolutely ludicrous. Get real! Before doing that, I will buy a case of 12 packs from a vendor offering free shipping.

Name: Patron174 Silver Tequila - 375ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Nothing to get up about and I thought it was expensive. I took them to work for everyone, there still there! lol

Name: Patron174 Silver Tequila - 375ml Bottle
Reviews Text: This is tasty. I liked it. The only drawback is that the individual wrappers are not sealed well so once the main package is opened many of them will get sticky in a month or two. Nor much of a problem really.

Name: Patron174 Silver Tequila - 375ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Had already tried liked the Citrus Green Tea Candy. Thought I'd give this flavor a go - but muchly prefer the Citrus.

Name: Patron174 Silver Tequila - 375ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Im a huge fan of BB's coffee candies and I adore green tea and matcha so I thought I would love these. They have a really odd taste after about 1 min in your mouth. I couldnt finish even one sadly and I was really looking forward to these.

Name: Patron174 Silver Tequila - 375ml Bottle
Reviews Text: Tried the Green Tea Latte while in Aruba and loved them! Tried the three pack and I'm hooked. I love the citrus best, but all are different and great throat lozenges (I hate menthol lozenges).

Name: Moet Chandon174 Imperial Champagne - 750ml Bottle
Reviews Text: The bottles are very pretty we haven't opened them yet. They look just like the picture pink with the emoji on them. Delivery was on time.

Name: Scales Margarita Mix, 33.8 fl oz
Reviews Text: I have tried the Margarita mix and the Bloody Mary mix. The Margarita mix is fantastic, especially if you add a little lime juice. The Bloody Mary mix is also very good but I like the Zing Zang Bloody Mary a little better and I think it is worth the few extra carbs. I plan to try the rest of the Scales Mixes and have already restocked the Margarita mix.

Name: Scales Margarita Mix, 33.8 fl oz
Reviews Text: I love this margarita mix! It has a great taste, and in my opinion it does not taste like fake sugar at all. My husband however was not a fan - he found it much too tart. I think it's definitely worth a try!

Name: Scales Margarita Mix, 33.8 fl oz
Reviews Text: I loved everything about this stuff. Now, I'm a local Charlestonian and can get this in my grocery store. But, if you are looking for a good healthy alternative to a Margarita, GO FOR IT! Their company website also offers this mix at a lower price. ENJOY!

Name: Scales Margarita Mix, 33.8 fl oz
Reviews Text: 3 stars only because this really tasty No Calorie margarita mix cast me 17 FOR ONE BOTTLE!I'm a margarita fan and also trying to lose some weight. There aren't many really good lime mixers out there in the Low to NO Calorie category, so when I discovered SCALES on the shelf while visiting in Scottsdale AZ (for a reasonable 6.99 bottle), I was delighted to discover how tangy limey good it tastes- just right for excellent margaritas, but cutting about 100-150 calories out of your cocktail!I was dismayed when I returned home (though not exactly surprised) to find that Scales was not available in Washington state. So when I looked for it on Amazon and saw its other flavors offered on prime for 7.99 and the Margarita was offered at 17, I thought this must be for two or three bottles. When only one showed up... well, what the hell.Still a great mixer, but why can't we get it for a reasonable price!!

Name: Scales Margarita Mix, 33.8 fl oz
Reviews Text: To me this tastes like a Crystal Light lemonade or lemon-lime mix. For the price and the many highly positive reviews, I had really expected something much tastier. I added the juice of two limes but still didn't care for the flavor compared to regular (not sugar-free) but less expensive margarita mixes I've tried. My spouse threw out his drink after one taste. We threw away the bottle so as not to waste any more tequila with this mix.

Name: Scales Margarita Mix, 33.8 fl oz
Reviews Text: For zero carbs/sugar this stuff is great. However the price online here is double that of my local grocery store. Unless I am missing something from the description that this is a multipack.If you are wanting a tasty zero carb drink this will certainly please you. The price here makes it tough to swallow.

Name: Scales Margarita Mix, 33.8 fl oz
Reviews Text: I am not sure why the other people said that this tastes good.... in my opinion it tastes awful! I would much rather not have a drink at all than drink this stuff.

Name: Zatarain's174 Root Beer Extract Bottle - 4 Floz
Reviews Text: Wanted Watkins Products root beer extract but it seems it is no longer available. This brand is all right but do not like the caramel color additive. Watkins is clear

Name: Zatarain's174 Root Beer Extract Bottle - 4 Floz
Reviews Text: great!

Name: Oreo Hot Cocoa Chocolate Sandwich Cookies - 10.7oz
Reviews Text: These have to be the most addicting oreos ever. The chocolate cookie with a marshmallow like center is wonderful but not over powering. VERY GOOD!!!

Name: Oreo Hot Cocoa Chocolate Sandwich Cookies - 10.7oz
Reviews Text: One of my favorite Oreo flavors. Wish it was year round even.

Name: Master of Mixes Big Bucket Premium Margarita Mixer, 96 fl oz
Reviews Text: This is really tasty, and easy to make. Just one ingredient to add. Only problem is that it's so good, it's easy to drink too much. I especially like it frozen.

Name: Master of Mixes Big Bucket Premium Margarita Mixer, 96 fl oz
Reviews Text: I love this product.

Name: Master of Mixes Big Bucket Premium Margarita Mixer, 96 fl oz
Reviews Text: I was glad to find this online, I usually see this during the summer in stores. This bucket is so convenient, just add tequila for a refreshing drink anytime. No need to measure and mix each time you want a nice cool margarita drink. Stores well in the refrigerator.

Name: Master of Mixes Big Bucket Premium Margarita Mixer, 96 fl oz
Reviews Text: The price was incredible and the delivery service better than could have hoped for

Name: Master of Mixes Big Bucket Premium Margarita Mixer, 96 fl oz
Reviews Text: Always a big hit at pool parties. Also good to keep in the freezer for a quick and easy drink. Delicious!

Name: Master of Mixes Big Bucket Premium Margarita Mixer, 96 fl oz
Reviews Title: OMG!! Best weekend I have ever spent alone!!
Reviews Text: Spent the weekend, home alone, working. Enjoyed the margaritas I made with this mix. I bought a quality tequila and added a shot of Grand Mariner. Just fabulous on the rocks.. frozen, hmm.. any which way was just fabulous!!

Name: Master of Mixes Big Bucket Premium Margarita Mixer, 96 fl oz
Reviews Text: really tasty especially for someone who doesn't have experience making drinks. Tastes as good or better than a bar or restaurant with a fraction of the cost

Name: Master of Mixes Big Bucket Premium Margarita Mixer, 96 fl oz
Reviews Text: I love that you get 98 ounces and that its less than 6. It makes great margaritas too. I hate that its not available in store because its great for parties.

Name: Master of Mixes Big Bucket Premium Margarita Mixer, 96 fl oz
Reviews Text: Makes very tasty frozen Margaritas for a low price. As good as some well-know chain restaurant Margaritas. I highly recommend.

Name: Mr _ Mrs T Margarita Mix, 5.5 fl oz, ()
Reviews Text: Great margarita mix. Most of all love the small cans when you just want to have 1, no waste. Great for taking on the go!

Name: Mr _ Mrs T Margarita Mix, 5.5 fl oz, ()
Reviews Text: easy tasty way to make margaritas with some ice in a ninja.

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: Pleasantly refreshing and smooth! We really enjoyed Vincent's twist and presentation very impressive! Thank you for inspiration!

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: I bought this product because I was in a squeeze to make drinks for a backyard BBQ party. I saw it on the the shelf (only 1 left!) and thought, Mm mules sound good for a nice spring day. I had pretty low expectations given my experience with other pre mix products, but let me tell you, WOW this product is delicious. It's the perfect balance of sweet and spicy ginger and reminds me of sipping out of fancy frozen glasses with friends at one my FAVORITE outdoor cocktail bars. Next time I'll just invite them to my backyard! This mix has me excited to try some of the other flavors, but I can't imagine ever passing up on the mule when I see it on the shelf!! Thanks Vincent, whoever you are, for making me a mule pro )

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: Great product. Fresh ingredients made a great mule. My friends don't have to know it was a mix )

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: I had the pleasure of drinking a cocktail cooked up by Vince when dining at Philadelphia's The Good King Tavern (which you must check out if you're in town, simply delicious!!). When I saw he released his own mix for such a staple summer cocktail I was quick to purchase. Needless to say it did not upset - 10/10 would recommend!!

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: Great drink! Great bottle! Woo!

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: Perfect product for house parties and cocktail events. Easy to use and really clean fresh flavors!

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: I just picked this up for my wife (and new mother) as part of a Mothers Day gift. We mixed it up before our dinner reservation last night at the house. Wow! She was smiling for the rest of the night and I gotta say I really liked it too. Definitely recommend it for the ladies in your life. Probably great for a party at the house too!

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: Refreshing and not too sweet.

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: My kids brought this over for Mothers Day and wow, what a hit! My son mixed up the best Moscow Mules ever, far better than what I've gotten out. Will definitely stock-up for the summer. GREAT product!

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: Definitely worth the price. Value product. Try it!!!

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: This mix is top notch! The bees knees! Whether I am relaxing at the end of my day or entertaining guests, I must always have this mule mix on deck. Would recommend to anybody!

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: The mule mix from Cocktail Artist was fun to make and EZ to feel like a pro! Thank you, Vincent, for special twist!!! Lots of flavor!

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: I really really enjoyed this. The taste was perfect and not too sweet. Can't wait to use it to entertain this summer. YUM!

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: I'm usually skeptical of a mix but this is the real deal.

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: I am hands down a vodka-drinker and LOVE a good Moscow Mule (especially in one of those icy cold copper mugs). My only complaint is that when I order them at bars, they are often way too sweet. This product tastes like fresh ginger and lime and the sugar is balanced perfectly! Great crowd pleaser when entertaining. People will think you made it from scratch!

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: I never thought mixes could be so good! I have been a cocktail enthusiast for sometime now but can never find the time to go out. This mix makes fantastic drinks in the comfort of my own home without emptying my wallet. I have all of my friends hooked on it now as well. It makes a perfect gift for fellow cocktail lovers anytime of the year. I could not give this product enough stars.

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: With Vincent's twist, we felt like we'd been served at a fun bar in professional setting! Easy and tasty!!

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: Love sharing this mix with friends - great product!

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: I am a huge fan of the Moscow Mule drink after Oprah turned me on to it, but I never make it myself. This mix made making Moscow Mules so easy, that I invested in a set of Cooper mugs!!!! Delicious, simple and refreshing. Going to stock up for summer!

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: This is a great product to have at home.

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: Highly recommend this premade Moscow Mule mix! Convenient to have at home and the recipe is a perfect balance to the rest of the ingredients. Reasonably priced too!

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: I love love love this mix. I'm not usually a mix girl, as I usually feel like it ends up being too sugary / doesn't taste how it's supposed to. But a friend recommended this to me and I tried it and it's perfect! Especially for an amateur cocktail-maker... It's not too sweet which allows you to sweeten as wanted, and it's fresh and delicious. And bonus, there's a pretty cute guy on the label. Highly highly recommend for Mule lovers!

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: Not only does it taste great and is refreshing on a hot summer day, but it's now a breeze to mix up a mule! I love how quick I can make one that tastes good, for myself and others. Highly recommended.

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: This mix is delicious. It helps that the guy on the bottle is so dreamy too.

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: AMAZING PRODUCT! SOBER FOR 6 YEARS AND BOY DOES THIS DO IT FOR ME! A PINT A DAY KEEPS THE DOCTOR AWAY!

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Title: BEST MIX I HAVE EVER HAD!!!!!
Reviews Text: This mix is perfect!!! Refreshing and not too sweet! I recommend this mix to everyone!

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: What a unique label! Easy mix made a delicious drink. Good idea for parties.

Name: Cocktail Artist Essential Bar Ingredients Premium Mule Mix, 25.3 fl oz
Reviews Text: This Moscow Mule mix is so delicious and refreshing! I will definitely be telling friends about this. So easy to make! Great for a party!

Name: Solana Agave Blanco Tequila, 750 mL
Reviews Text: I am a Cabo and Patron Anejo snob, who wouldn't drink Jose Quervo to save my own life. Jose Quervo is not tequila, but Solana Silver is! I wanted to try a silver, and picked this up on a gamble, at half the price of what I normally buy. 100 agava smooth tasted like tequila should!

Name: Solana Agave Blanco Tequila, 750 mL
Reviews Text: Solana Blanco is a very mild tasting tequila. If you see it on a Walmart shelf, grab it and try it. You will not be disappointed. It flies off the shelf at my store.

Name: Crown Royal Maple Finish Whiskey, 750 mL
Reviews Title: Maple Crown Is The Best Thing Ever!!!
Reviews Text: Maple crown is by far my favorite whiskey to date. It goes great with Coca Cola products. A must buy!!!

Name: Bella Bolle Bella Rosso Wine, 750 mL
Reviews Text: Tastes like juice that makes you unwind. Perfect for that end of the day glass. I only wish it were easier to find. My local store is often out of stock.

Name: Jim Beam Black Bourbon Whiskey, 50 mL
Reviews Text: I'm a single malt Scotch guy. I generally have two fingers neat with a quality cigar about once a week. On a stressful day, I'll have a couple of beers or so after work before the family gets home. The trouble is the beer gut that comes with that trend. I was looking for something similar to my favorite Scotch, which is a little out of my budget to drink daily. Jim Beam Black is an awesome substitute with the rich white oak aroma and flavor. It isn't near as smooth as my favorite Scotch, but the flavor is on point. Thank you Jim Beam for putting this great whiskey out there at an affordable price. You've got a customer for life!

Name: Jim Beam Black Bourbon Whiskey, 50 mL
Reviews Text: Exceptionally good flavor!

Name: Jim Beam Black Bourbon Whiskey, 50 mL
Reviews Text: No matter where I go after years of various bourbon tastings....Jim Beam Black is head and shoulders above the rest no matter what the price tag!

Name: Jim Beam Black Bourbon Whiskey, 50 mL
Reviews Text: I'm personally a wild turkey drinker. But cudos to Jim beam for producing such a classy commercial. Got the right girl to be their spokesperson. Good job. Very classy.

Name: Jim Beam Black Bourbon Whiskey, 50 mL
Reviews Title: When you want to experience perfection, look no further!
Reviews Text: Seriously You ask what's great about it What isn't great about it

Name: Jim Beam Black Bourbon Whiskey, 50 mL
Reviews Text: No explanation necessary.

Name: Jim Beam Black Bourbon Whiskey, 50 mL
Reviews Text: I first started drinking Jim Bean when i went camping. I didnt want to carry the bear around so i tried jim bean. My first was Red Stag Cherry. Than i tried devils cut when i came home. I have been hooked ever since. I usually mix with coke or dr.pepper.

Name: Jim Beam Black Bourbon Whiskey, 50 mL
Reviews Text: This is the best bourbon under 50 you can buy. One of the smoothest bourbons I've tasted. I typically drink Woodford Reserve or Eagle Rare until I tried this. I buy a bottle every two weeks now.

Name: Jim Beam Black Bourbon Whiskey, 50 mL
Reviews Title: I would definitely buy this quality bourbon again
Reviews Text: This is Beam at it's best very smooth.

Name: Jim Beam Black Bourbon Whiskey, 50 mL
Reviews Text: I tried JB Black for the first time tonight. It is so smooth. We made whiskey sours with it and they were awesome. Thanks Jim Beam for this awesome bourbon!!!

Name: Jim Beam Black Bourbon Whiskey, 50 mL
Reviews Title: Love it, cannot find it anywhere
Reviews Text: I have been enjoying JB Black for the past three years. The has all the flavor os a higher proof, bur 86, I can have another without collapsing. Now it has disappeared from even the most extensive liquor stores in my area. What happened The double oaked is OK, but no match for the black. Where can I find it in Sonoma County, California

Name: Jim Beam Black Bourbon Whiskey, 50 mL
Reviews Text: I bought this in early December and it didn't make it to the new year... This one is Awesome, keep up the great work!

Name: Jim Beam Black Bourbon Whiskey, 50 mL

Reviews Text: I was shyed away at first from clamato. Strange enough, I love bloody Mary's and all I eat is seafood. So, one would think, clams and tomato juice wouldn't be a problem. WELL. I made my own bloody caesar with CLAMATO at home. A touch of cracked pepper, hot sauce, old bay seasoning. And it was FANTASTIC!

Name: Clamato Original Tomato Cocktail - 64 Fl Oz Bottle
Reviews Text: I really like Clamato juice! I tried it because I thought that the savory notes of clam juice would be refreshing, and it really is the most delicious, refreshing, salty drink ever. I've made sure to always keep a bottle in the fridge.

Name: Clamato Original Tomato Cocktail - 64 Fl Oz Bottle
Reviews Text: Very good!

Name: Clamato Original Tomato Cocktail - 64 Fl Oz Bottle
Reviews Text: I fell in love with Clamato over 30 yrs ago. My mom drank it and so i was introduced to it at a young age. Now as an adult i absolutely love it alone or mixing it up for some micheladas with my pops! We always have at least 2 bottles in the fridge!

Name: Clamato Original Tomato Cocktail - 64 Fl Oz Bottle
Reviews Text: I have been drinking Clamato for years and using it as a mixer for years. Nothing else compares. Bring back Beefmoto

Name: Clamato Original Tomato Cocktail - 64 Fl Oz Bottle
Reviews Title: My Review for Original Tomato Cocktail
Reviews Text: I have diabetes and Chronic Kidney Disease and I love Clamato Juice Cocktail and it is good for my kidney AND my diabetes. I have at least one glass a day.

Name: Clamato Original Tomato Cocktail - 64 Fl Oz Bottle
Reviews Text: Very refreshing served iced cold.

Name: Clamato Original Tomato Cocktail - 64 Fl Oz Bottle
Reviews Title: Clamazing!! The clamax of my day
Reviews Text: Best item I have ever purchased, hands down. So delicious, words can't do it justice. My favorite part is the clams, and also the tomato. How is it possible to unite two vastly different flavor a in such a harmonizing blend I don't know, but the result is beautiful and so delicious. I will definitely purchase again. Actually I am on the way right now. Walmart that is. To buy Clamato.

Name: Clamato Original Tomato Cocktail - 64 Fl Oz Bottle
Reviews Text: Clamato does not have a distinct clam flavor it's refreshing and with a nice balance to the tomato and clam and lime and spices. It's a nice alternative to V8 or tomato juice and works well in a cocktail blend.

Name: Clamato Original Tomato Cocktail - 64 Fl Oz Bottle
Reviews Text: This is my favorite beverage. Do not be afraid of the clam and tomato mix, it is fantastic. We drink a container per week. Some as Bloody Mary (Caesar). It has to be popular because Walmart is frequently sold out! I have tried the picante version, but the original is the best.

Name: Clamato Original Tomato Cocktail - 64 Fl Oz Bottle
Reviews Text: Makes great bloody marys

Name: Clamato Original Tomato Cocktail - 64 Fl Oz Bottle
Reviews Text: The Clamato Cocktail is the best juice i have tasted in a long time. I have a small glass with every dinner. Good flavor, Great Taste.

Name: Clamato Original Tomato Cocktail - 64 Fl Oz Bottle
Reviews Text: This is the absolute best tomato juice to use in a Bloody Mary. Because it contains clam juice, the drink is called a clam digger. Buy this all the time. Mix it with vodka, Worcestershire sauce, lemon juice and hot sauce. Best drink.

Name: Clamato Original Tomato Cocktail - 64 Fl Oz Bottle
Reviews Title: so glad you can buy it here now
Reviews Text: Being from Canada it so so good to see Motts Clamato juice was available at Walmart. We all know you can't make a Ceasar without it, There is a difference. A Ceasar is made with Clamato juice, a Bloody Mary is with tomato juice.

Name: Clamato Original Tomato Cocktail - 64 Fl Oz Bottle
Reviews Text: I didnt like the idea of clam and tomato juice, but tried it anyway. I was pleasantly surprised with its refreshing taste. Whether it is served over ice, or as a part of a mixed drink, it is excellent.

Name: Clamato Original Tomato Cocktail - 64 Fl Oz Bottle

Name: Coco Real174 Cream Of Coconut Drink Mix - 21oz
Reviews Text: This is great. We use cream of coconut often. We hate to have to buy cans that we can save after use. This coco real product allows to use the amount needed and save the rest. The taste of Coco Real is wonderful. We've used it for drinks and even on burgers. Never a complaint.

Name: Peychauds Aromatic Cocktail Bitters - 10 oz
Reviews Text: I love a good champagne cocktail and this brand of bitters is MUCH better than the bitters found at the grocery store.

Name: Peychauds Aromatic Cocktail Bitters - 10 oz
Reviews Title: Bitters are the cure for whatever ails you...
Reviews Text: Peychaud's is a great way to expand your bitters collection, especially if all you have is the classic Angostura.It's got some nice anise, cherry and other notes in there, and is perfect for a wide variety of cocktails. You can't always use it as a straight up exchange for Angostura, but a lot of times you can. It'll give your cocktail a whole different stir.But why stop at alcoholic drinks Use bitters in all kinds of beverages, both soft and hard.A few dashes of Peychaud's in your root beer or cola will transform it into something sublime. The usually muted vanilla and caramel aromatics will really burst forth.And the perfect hangover cure is lots of bitters and soda.Grab a bottle and don't let it get dusty on your shelf!

Name: Peychauds Aromatic Cocktail Bitters - 10 oz
Reviews Text: I love a good champagne cocktail and this brand of bitters is MUCH better than the bitters found at the grocery store.

Name: Peychauds Aromatic Cocktail Bitters - 10 oz
Reviews Text: I needed this to make my new favorite cocktail, (sazeracs) and it is a great product. Hard to find but leave it to Amazon to come through once again. The service and shipping was very fast also.

Name: Peychauds Aromatic Cocktail Bitters - 10 oz
Reviews Title: Need some for Sazeracs, great in Manhattans
Reviews Text: If you want to have a complete battery of bitters for mixing drinks at home or at a bar, you need:Orange BittersPeach BittersLemon BittersOld Fashioned (Angostura-type) BittersPeychaud's BittersJaegermeisterCampariUnicumYou can't get Peychaud's bitters anywhere else...nothing else compares. I think its one of the most versatile bitters there is. Is great as a digestif, too. I like it more than Underberg's as a digestif.

Name: Peychauds Aromatic Cocktail Bitters - 10 oz
Reviews Text: A must for a Sazerac.-3 oz rye whiskey-3/4 oz simple syrup-Peychaud bitters to taste-absinthe or absinthe substitute-Lemon twist for garnish

Name: Peychauds Aromatic Cocktail Bitters - 10 oz
Reviews Title: Great product, but it may not be the one you are looking for
Reviews Text: If you are looking for bitters for an old fashioned, manhattan, or any other drink that simply says bitters in the recipe, this is probably not what you want. Peychauds bitters taste very different than angostura bitters, as they have a character that tastes more like anise, absinthe, or black licorice. If that is indeed what you are looking for, for a drink such a sazerac, then you are in the right place. This bottle is 10oz, which is the larger size, and will indeed make many sazeracs.

Name: Peychauds Aromatic Cocktail Bitters - 10 oz
Reviews Text: Peychaud's Bitters is the defining ingredient in the classic New Orlean's cocktail known as the Sazerac, allegedly the first cocktail invented in the U.S., dating to the pre-Civil War period.As such, there's no substitute! It lends a mildly bitter taste and a sophisticated aroma to any beverage. In addition to mixing it for Sazeracs (check on line for various recipe versions), I add 7 - 10 drops to an iced glass of tonic or lemon-lime soda when I want a super-low-alcohol beverage with the taste of an alcohol cocktail. I find it soothes both the nerves and the digestive system.

Name: Peychauds Aromatic Cocktail Bitters - 10 oz
Reviews Text: This is just one of those things you need if you really want a complete bar. They do have a pretty interesting and distinct taste, but it doesn't show up as potently as some other bitters in drinks.I bought the 10oz because it was cheaper per ounce after shipping. Note that Fee and Angostura usually sell their products in 4oz size. I don't think either of those companies make a Peychauds substitute.So what calls for Peychauds bitters besides a Sazerac Well, a tequila/absinthe sazerac for one (thanks to Absinthe Cocktails by Kate Simon). I'll keep looking for other uses...

Name: Peychauds Aromatic Cocktail Bitters - 10 oz
Reviews Text: One doesn't need to travel to New Orleans for the perfect Sazarac. Make it with this ingredient, along with some good rye whiskey. This is also good in iced tea....mmmmm!

Name: Peychauds Aromatic Cocktail Bitters - 10 oz
Reviews Text: Adds a nice flavor to manhattans. Lots of flavor. I use Peychauds with other bitters in ice water for a great 0 calorie drink. Vary the amounts of each for a well rounded drink. Peychauds can be used alone because it has the high, medium and base flavor notes. Try it.

Name: Peychauds Aromatic Cocktail Bitters - 10 oz
Reviews Text: Good stuff, adds interest to many otherwise ordinary cocktails. I'm still experimenting with this one, but so far I've used it in many drink recipes it seems to go especially well with sweet drinks.

Name: Peychauds Aromatic Cocktail Bitters - 10 oz
Reviews Text: I needed this to make my new favorite cocktail, (sazeracs) and it is a great product. Hard to find but leave it to Amazon to come through once again. The service and shipping was very fast also.

Name: Master of Mixes Big Bucket Strawberry Margarita Daiquiri Mixer, 96 fl oz
Reviews Text: They were a big hit at my daughters wedding.

Name: Master of Mixes Big Bucket Strawberry Margarita Daiquiri Mixer, 96 fl oz
Reviews Text: I love this stuff! I add vodka and freeze, then scoop out and its a great slushi!

Name: Master of Mixes Big Bucket Strawberry Margarita Daiquiri Mixer, 96 fl oz
Reviews Title: It is what it it is
Reviews Text: The mix inside the container smells very similar to kool aid. It is a good sugary drink mix when access to a blender or the time to make a homemade product is unavailable. It's decent for the price though my guest seemed to like it. A word of caution before pouring anything into the bucket carefully inspect the bottom of the bucket and spout for damage. On one of these my bucket was uknowlingly damaged and I lost a substantial amount as my margarita dripped out into the freezer. - Cheers

Name: Master of Mixes Big Bucket Strawberry Margarita Daiquiri Mixer, 96 fl oz
Reviews Text: If you love frozen drinks this is easy preparation and great tasting. Not just for parties.

Name: Master of Mixes Big Bucket Strawberry Margarita Daiquiri Mixer, 96 fl oz

Name: Master of Mixes Big Bucket Strawberry Margarita Daiquiri Mixer, 96 fl oz

Reviews Text: a well balanced and good tasting mix, I would recommend this mix

Name: La Marca Prosecco Sparkling Wine, 750 mL
Reviews Text: We love the smooth, bubbly taste. We drink it with orange juice for brunch every weekend. Without the OJ, it's just as delicious paired with seafood or a girls night out.

Name: Knob Creek Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey, 1.75 L
Reviews Text: So good. I like the hotter bourbons, and at 120+, there is nothing better at this price point. This is like a Stagg Jr that you can actually find at retail price, or find at all. Underrated, and I just assume it stays that way.

Name: Knob Creek Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey, 1.75 L
Reviews Text: I AM A SINGLE MALT SCOTCH AFICIANADO. RECENTLY I HAVE DECIDED TO EMBRACE MY AMERICAN HERITAGE BY TRYING BOURBONS. IN THE BACK OF MY MIND, I HAD THE SUSPICION, THAT SUCH NATIONALISTIC IDEALS ARE DOOMED TO FAIL BUT OH MY GOODNESS! THE KNOB CREEK KENTUCKY STRAIGHT IS EVERYTHING I HAVE DESIRED! RICH, MELLOW, FRUITY, AND SUFFICIENTLY HEAVY TO KEEP ME LIGHT.

Name: Knob Creek Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey, 1.75 L
Reviews Text: Knob creek has become my go-to. mixed with ginger ale or straight, you can't go wrong with knob creek's kentucky straight bourbon whiskey.

Name: Knob Creek Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey, 1.75 L
Reviews Text: one of my simple pleasures in life is a Knob Creek 100 proof on the rocks. it is fantastic.

Name: Knob Creek Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey, 1.75 L
Reviews Text: I have loved it since the first time I tried it. However, in my country it's not sold. In a recent trip abroad, I finally found it and bought a bottle. Now I'm looking forward to share it with friends. Wonderful bourbon!

Name: Knob Creek Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey, 1.75 L
Reviews Text: Straight or on ice, smooth and no bite.

Name: Knob Creek Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey, 1.75 L
Reviews Title: I've already put aside Maker's and Woodford.
Reviews Text: From the first sniff in the glass to finally reaching my lips. Aaa+++ Bourbon!!!! Very happy with my purchase. I've already told my buddies to come by for a taste.

Name: Knob Creek Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey, 1.75 L
Reviews Text: For 100 Proof, this bourbon is sweet and mellow. The slight burn at the finish reminds you that you are still alive.

Name: Knob Creek Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey, 1.75 L
Reviews Text: Previous bottles stated aged nine years. Last bottle purchased shows no age. Taste appeared a little harsher than previously.

Name: Knob Creek Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey, 1.75 L
Reviews Text: This is a superb quality whiskey. My go to!

Name: Knob Creek Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey, 1.75 L
Reviews Title: Great recommendation. Great Bourbon. Great price.
Reviews Text: This is a go-to bourbon for me. A friend recommended the 9 year as a good, full bodied bourbon at a really good price...and needless to say...it didn't disappoint. I typically have either neat or at times over an (oversized) ice cube. Either way, I get really good, smooth flavors (somewhat woody, somewhat caramel-ly) and enjoy it on a regular basis. I consider this to be one the best Bourbons for a really good price.

Name: Knob Creek Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey, 1.75 L
Reviews Title: The type of honest whiskey a man respects.
Reviews Text: A bright amber dram that is bold yet soft on the back of the tongue and lights a fire on the way down. The nose is a velvety riot of vanilla and caramel that finishes with a hint of sour mash. It is the kind of whiskey that a man would choose to enjoy after a hunt or after a wake to remember good times and good friends.

Name: Knob Creek Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey, 1.75 L
Reviews Text: Wow! What a punch! Yet smooth enough to enjoy.

Name: Admiral Nelson Spiced Rum, 1.75 L
Reviews Text: This tastes great for the price and is as close to the captain as I have found.

Name: Martini _ Rossi Asti Sparkling Wine, 750 mL
Reviews Text: I bought 16 of these for a small wedding dinner. Went over well. This is a standard sweet sparkling Asti with consistent quality and reasonable price year after year.

Name: Martini _ Rossi Asti Sparkling Wine, 750 mL
Reviews Text: Good price and product

Name: Bartles _ Jaymes Margarita Cocktail,  355 mlL
Reviews Text: light crispy flavor, very refreshing add a little salt and it is perfect

Name: Switchblade Jack Pumpkin Ale, Beer Making Ingredient Extract Kit
Reviews Text: This tastes amazing, so far the best from Jasper's.The magic potion is just annoying to brew with. When you add it to the beer it turns into a mucusy substance and you need to strain it out which is really hard. Other than that it is great!

Name: Switchblade Jack Pumpkin Ale, Beer Making Ingredient Extract Kit
Reviews Title: Awesome delivery 4 people found this helpful. Was this review helpful to you Yes No
Reviews Text: I haven't had a chance to brew this beer, but everything about the process has been great so far. They are in state, so the package arrived timely and the protective shipping package was superb. The kit even has a funny coffee stain on it with a note basically saying they wont explain - but it's important. Funny detail, and gives me a sense of their personality. Also, due to this specific brew - you can probably expect your box to smell as absolutely jaw droppingly amazing as mine. Spice, malts, sweetness. Ughhhh. I keep opening and closing the box and sniffing the bags so much that my girlfriend is getting annoyed.The actual product itself is quite comprehensive - best kit I've purchased thus far. It comes with stickers for your bottle caps, (great idea guys!), was comparatively priced against competitors beers, a large bag of liquid malt, a smaller bag of dry malt, a can of pumpkin pie mix (debating tossing in another can on my own), brown sugar, a long vanilla bean stalk with a pouch of cinnamon, bittering hops, cheesecloth, priming sugar and dry yeast. Wow. Excellent care in their product for an absolutely appropriate price.I Cannot WAIT to brew this beer, and I absolutely anticipate doing a lot more business with Jaspers.

Name: Switchblade Jack Pumpkin Ale, Beer Making Ingredient Extract Kit
Reviews Title: Frighteningly Good One person found this helpful. Was this review helpful to you Yes No
Reviews Text: My 3rd homebrew ever and a step up from my other kit beers. It smelled so amazing brewing and fermenting. Despite my rookie mistake by moving it to secondary fermentation after active fermentation was over it was a forgiving beer. Carbonation was slow but at 7 weeks it's maturing into a tasty, wickedly good beer. Mouth feel and foamy head throughout (yes I hear the snickers) but a fantastic beer. Will be brewing my next batch soon and just tried another Jasper's product Shut the Fck Up Amber - already in secondary fermentation - well played. Boomchugalug.

Name: Switchblade Jack Pumpkin Ale, Beer Making Ingredient Extract Kit
Reviews Text: This tastes amazing, so far the best from Jasper's.The magic potion is just annoying to brew with. When you add it to the beer it turns into a mucusy substance and you need to strain it out which is really hard. Other than that it is great!

Name: Switchblade Jack Pumpkin Ale, Beer Making Ingredient Extract Kit

Name: Switchblade Jack Pumpkin Ale, Beer Making Ingredient Extract Kit
Reviews Text: I haven't had a chance to brew this beer, but everything about the process has been great so far. Wow. Excellent care in their product for an absolutely appropriate price.I Cannot WAIT to brew this beer, and I absolutely anticipate doing a lot more business with Jaspers.

Name: Switchblade Jack Pumpkin Ale, Beer Making Ingredient Extract Kit
Reviews Text: I bought two of these kits to make ten gallons. After 3 weeks in the 2- 5 gallon primary's I kegged 5 gallons. The instructions for the vodka, spices and vanilla bean slurry were vague as to when to make the potion and how to store it. I mixed mine on brew day and it sat in the fridge while the beer fermented. It turned into a snot ball. I sanitized a mason jar and took half the ten gallons worth of potion mixture and while I kegged I added some beer to the jar and shook it vigorously to break up the snot ball. It worked for the most part. The first 3 beers came out a bit chunky but it cleared up. The potion made the beer taste a bit like cider. It's got a very upfront pumkin spice kick with hints of cinnamon. I'm not a big fan of these prominent flavors so I bottled the second 5 gallons without the potion.Overall the kits good. The abv came out at about 6.9 after adding an extra pound of dextrose.I expect he bottles to be a bit more to my liking.

Name: Switchblade Jack Pumpkin Ale, Beer Making Ingredient Extract Kit

Name: Jim Beam Black Bourbon Whiskey, 1.0 L
Reviews Text: I'm a single malt Scotch guy. I generally have two fingers neat with a quality cigar about once a week. On a stressful day, I'll have a couple of beers or so after work before the family gets home. The trouble is the beer gut that comes with that trend. I was looking for something similar to my favorite Scotch, which is a little out of my budget to drink daily. Jim Beam Black is an awesome substitute with the rich white oak aroma and flavor. It isn't near as smooth as my favorite Scotch, but the flavor is on point. Thank you Jim Beam for putting this great whiskey out there at an affordable price. You've got a customer for life!

Name: Jim Beam Black Bourbon Whiskey, 1.0 L
Reviews Text: Exceptionally good flavor!
